basics.bio: I am a **Professor** at the Department of Computer Engineering, Boğaziçi University . My research focuses on *Natural Language Processing*, *Machine Translation*, *Machine Learning*, and *Artificial Intelligence*. I lead research projects on Turkish NLP resources, text classification, speech recognition, and information extraction.
